page.title: 20Road Transport
page.content: At the present time, major roadworks are under way to alleviate the congestion at the{Army and Navy roundabout, the major bottle neck on the{A12.}The work is being carried out by the Cementation Company.The road is to be 14\km long, with 5 interchanges. There will be 5km of side road works, with a further 5km of farmers' access tracks where fields have been cut off from the main farm land. They will move 2 million cubic metres of soil during the operation and install 100 km of drainage. It is to be a dual carriageway made of concrete. There will be 19 structures, mainly bridges. The work started in July 1984 and should finish in Oct. 1986.Of the 200 people employed, many are local. Key men on the staff are the "nomads of the mid 80's" and live in caravans on the site, behind a mound of soil.
